titleNullable: Plastic and Paper Cups Synthetic Image Dataset
subtitleNullable: Images of Plastic and Paper Cups for Image Segmentation and Classification.
descriptionNullable: ## Overview This Dataset Contains Synthetic Images of Paper and Plastic Cups. The ImageClassesCombined folder contains annotated images of all classes combined. The annotations are in the COCO format. There is also a sample test_image.jpg but you could also use your own or split the data if you prefer. Foreground images are taken from free stock image sites like unsplash.com, pexels.com, and pixabay.com. Cover Photo Designed by Freepik ## Inspiration I want to create a dataset that could be used for image classification in different settings. The dataset can be used to train a CNN model for image detection and segmentation tasks in domains like agriculture, recycling, and many more.
